original_text: He wrote about them in all his letters. Some things that he has written are difficult for people to understand. Some people have weak minds and they are not sure about what they believe. They explain Paul's teaching in a way that deceives people. They also explain other things in the Bible wrongly. As a result, those people will destroy themselves and God will punish them.
korean_text: 또 그 모든 편지에도 이런 일에 관하여 말하였으되 그 중에 알기 어려운 것이 더러 있으니 무식한 자들과 굳세지 못한 자들이 다른 성경과 같이 그것도 억지로 풀다가 스스로 멸망에 이르느니라

sentences.original_text: He wrote about them in all his letters.
Some things that he has written are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 쓴 일부 내용들은 사람들이 이해하기 어렵습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they are not sure about what they believe.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기들이 믿는 것에 대해 확신하지 못합니다.

sentences.original_text: They explain Paul's teaching in a way that deceives people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들을 속이는 방식으로 바울의 가르침을 설명합니다.

sentences.original_text: They also explain other things in the Bible wrongly.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 성경의 다른 내용들을 잘못 설명합니다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, those people will destroy themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그 사람들은 스스로를 파멸시킬 것입니다.
